EmailTemplate.subject: Tuesday ToolDay: Complimentary Virtual Health Monitor Tool
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FREE Virtual Health Monitor Others charge for monitoring. We charge for Control. Our monitoring is free. Forever. Actually. Literally.
Get Free Virtual Health Monitor: <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm-star>
Check Us Out At VMworld! <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmworld-2014-preparing-hyperdrive?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm-star> VMTurbo’s Virtual Health Monitor is a free monitoring & reporting tool for virtual environments. It provides single pane of glass visibility into VM and infrastructure health.
- Monitor Storage, Compute, & Network performance in single pane of glass - Flexible dashboards & reports: datacenters, clusters, hosts, data stores, VMs - Efficiency recommendations to maximize resources - Unlimited scale – no limitations on number of hosts or VMs - Easy deployment - up and running in less than an hour Get Free Tool <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm-star> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
